cellformat.cell-name: The name of the Cell, e.g. Empty Cell, Wall Cell
cellformat.cell-id: The identifier of the Cell for display on the Grid
cellformat.color: The color of the Cell's identifier as a hexadecimal value
cellformat.alignment: The team alignment of this Cell. Integer. 1-9 for team-alignment, 0 for environmental
cellformat.exists: A Boolean value for the Cell existing in the first place!
cellformat.destructable: A Boolean value for whether this Cell can be destroyed
cellformat.block-ranged: A Boolean value for the Block Property, i.e. can Ranged attacks go through this Cell
cellformat.is-occupied: A Boolean value indicating whether or not this Cell is occupied
cellformat.has-stats: A Boolean value determining whether or not we care about stat values for this Cell
cellformat.current-health: Integer representation of the Cell's current HP
cellformat.max-health: Integer representation of the Cell's max HP
cellformat.current-mana: Integer representation of the Cell's current MP
cellformat.max-mana: Integer representation of the Cell's max MP
cellformat.attack: Integer representation of the Cell's Atk stat
cellformat.defense: Integer representation of the Cell's Def stat
cellformat.intelligence: Integer representation of the Cell's Int stat
cellformat.spirit: Integer representation of the Cell's Spr stat
cellformat.critical: Integer representation of the Cell's Critical percentage
cellformat.evasion: Integer representation of the Cell's Evasion percentage
cellformat.guard: Integer representation of the Cell's Guard percentage (used mainly for Shields -- will generally be 0)
cellformat.movement: Integer representation of the Cell's Movement stat
cellformat.x-gauge: Integer representation of the Cell's current number of excess levels
cellformat.constitution: Integer representation of the Cell's Con stat. Will be invisible but used for knockback damage.
